me.title: 1 - About me
me.intro: A recently graduated IT specialist and video game nerd.

popup.title: Additional information:
popup.p1: As mentioned earlier, my name is Viliina. I am an enthusiastic IT graduate whose current interests include web design, responsiveness, and ensuring accessibility.
popup.p2: In my free time I play video games, create art, or knit. In short, I enjoy working with my hands and building things.
popup.p3_before: I have recently applied what I have learned by creating my own projects such as Google Sheets and Cheatsheets. You can view my personal artwork

projects.title: 3 - Projects
projects.text: My projects (possibly unfinished) can be found on my GitHub!
